page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: {LIVE STOCK ON THE HILLS} The higher ground is used for grazing{ {Sheep}and{Cattle. }These animals go to the {KILDEAN MARKET}in{STIRLING.}This is held on Thursdays. The animals are auctioned. Some are sold on their own, some in groups. First they are weighed and then they go into the ring. Once they have been sold they are marked so that they can't be sold again by mistake. Sometimes the sheep jump over the gates and go every where. After they are sold some animals go to the slaughter house.
